paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 N372H polymorphism, including penetrance data and variant details.

functional_data.summary: The N372H polymorphism is associated with increased risk of ovarian cancer.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in families.
variants.evidence_level: Moderate evidence for association with ovarian cancer risk.
variants.additional_notes: The allele H might increase the risk of ovarian cancer, especially for serous subtype.
key_quotes: Our meta-analysis suggests that the N372H polymorphism is associated with susceptibility of ovarian cancer.
The risk may be even greater for ovarian cancers of the serous subtype.

extraction_metadata.notes: Data extracted from the main text; no tables were provided.
